metadata.title: CVE-2020-9430 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description: In Wireshark 3.2.0 to 3.2.1, 3.0.0 to 3.0.8, and 2.6.0 to 2.6.14, the WiMaxDLMAP dissector could crash. This was addressed inplugins/epan/wimax/msg_dlmap.c by validating a length field.

criterions.comment: wireshark: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
